name: TAL: Arctic 4
description:
TAL: Arctic 4 - This is a game in which you have to help an unknown creature to go to a magical portal through many mazes.
  • 60 levels
  • No traps and no time-limited levels. Only free pass mode
  • Original soundtrack
  • Gloomy atmosphere
  • Steam Achievements
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
